title.message: Subscription link factory for Adblock Plus

s1.message: This page allows you to build links that will open the subscription dialog automatically (like this one). Subscription authors can then add these links to their web pages to make subscribing easier — users only need to click the link and confirm adding the subscription. Adblock Plus 1.2 and above also permit the specification of a required additional filter list when creating a link to a supplementary filter subscription.

s2.message: Please enter the location of the subscription
